channel.title: Overloadx MYsql Problems
channel.description: I have no Clue how to work the MySql problem.. Overloadx is my favorite 317 private server and only thing stopping me is the mysql.. ill download ones with it removd.. but it doesnt work! can someone Teamview me and do it for me please!

item.title: Overloadx MYsql Problems
item.dc:creator: @l0gin1 l0gin.
item.description:
@l0gin1 wrote:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\cfg\prices.txt (The system cannot find the file specified)

create a text document called “prices” in the cfg folder

Read full topic

item.title: Overloadx MYsql Problems
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

this is what i get with the mysql still there

The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,341,706,946,312 mill
iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond
s ago.
Unable to connect to MySQL
Press any key to continue . . .

then when mySQL is removed(downloaded from someone else) i get this error

java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\cfg\prices.txt (The system cannot find the
file specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.Scanner.(Unknown Source)
at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:308)
at server.world.ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:34)
at server.Server.(Server.java:62)
[7/7/12 8:24 PM]: Launching Runefx…
[7/7/12 8:24 PM]: Loaded clipmap in 437ms.
[7/7/12 8:24 PM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594
12
8
8
12
10
10
10
12
12
12
10

and the numbers keep going on forever…

Read full topic
